meanings.sent1: Her indomitable spirit kept her going even when things were tough.
meanings.sent2: The lion's indomitable strength made it the king of the jungle.
meanings.sent3: Despite the rainy weather, his indomitable determination to finish the race never wavered.
meanings.sent4: The mountain stood tall and indomitable against the backdrop of the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The indomitable warrior fought bravely until the very end.

meanings.definition: Unyielding or persistent in the face of difficulty or opposition.
meanings.sent1: His indomitable willpower helped him overcome every obstacle in his path.
meanings.sent2: The old tree's indomitable roots held firm against the strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The indomitable toddler refused to eat his vegetables, no matter how much his parents tried.
meanings.sent4: Her indomitable courage inspired those around her to never give up.
meanings.sent5: The indomitable athlete pushed through the pain to reach the finish line.
